name: The Adventure of Donnie
description:
The Adventure of Donnie

The Adventure of Donnie is a 2D mathematics educational platformer game where the player needs to help Donnie overcome obstacles and defeat four bosses by solving math equations. The main character is named Donnie, who accidentally entered a magical portal that goes to an unknown realm named "Math World," guiding him back to his house by assisting him in overcoming challenges and hurdles. He can only return to his own world if he can defeat all four bosses. Start you adventure with Donnie into the Math World!

This game is a capstone project and still in development. Any feedback will much appreciated!

Capstone Team:

  • Richard Mampo
  • Jonas Abad
  • Elmer Trinidad Jr.
  • John Lester Agnas
  • Shan Estur

Controls

A - move left

D - move right

Space - Jump/next dialogue

Mouse - navigation
